content.detailedDescription: I was walking towards my car which is parked on a hill in front of our house; we live out in the suburbs away from the bright city lights so you can usually see the night sky very clearly; so when i looked up at the stars (which i frequently do in the evenings) i noticed what appeared to be a flickering star that was moving in a rather strange manner; it seemed to "skip" across the sky from left to right and then stop for a brief few seconds; then resume "skipping" and then stop again for a few seconds; then resumed "skipping" and then stopped; then after sitting still for several more seconds, it completely blinked-out and vanished altogether. the entire episode took only about 2 minutes or so but it made the hairs on the back of my neck stand up; i don't know of any man-made aircraft or even spacecraft that can move like that. what i witnessed totally defies the laws of physics as i know them to be.
content.summary: Flickering star-like object "skipping" across the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Looking at the constellation orion when four or five faint balls of light crossed the sky heading southwest in seconds at what appeared to be extremly high altitude and one of the lights seemed to move around the others as they moved accross the sky. they faded out of view extremly fast.
i noticed jet planes in the sky at the same time and as a watcher for this for many years i know these were not any known aircraft, i have seen two other ufo's in my lifetime but only shared it with close friends only to be laughed at so finally watching the sky at night when i go out to smoke has proved that something is flying around up there, ours or thiers?
content.summary: Four or five faint balls of light crossed the sky  in seconds,

content.detailedDescription:
Jan 3 2011
 i was lying in bed and could not sleep.As i looked out my window on 2 nd story.I saw a bright shining something shaped like a v something and sometimes like an l,so rolled over and tried to sleep,couuld not sleep.I got up opened the window to hear if was a helicopter,no sound.Was hovering in same place for  45 mins to hour this was 2 a.M.Lights where bright white w blueish tint would flash and run in sequence.It would move left to right quickly then hover then would up and down.When i first seen it thought was a star or airplane.There was no air traffic that nite and the skies were clear.Never seen any aircraft move live that!Then it moved north a little and to the rightand goes thru same motions.As i viewed this was interesting and thought if ican see them they can see me?Then it seemed to come closer then move away.But i had a sense of peace and slept well.Oh ,what i would of give for a video camera.So,after watching as long as i could i went to sleep.Dont know how it left?I was tryin to stay awake to see but could not.I did see look like 2 falling stars or flases of orangeish lights
 thank you,
*(wit's name deleted -- cms/sg).

ps:dont drink,smoke or do drugs!
content.summary: V shaped or inverted triangle hovered above n. ga mountains lights flashing

content.detailedDescription: At 1:30am my boyfriend and i went for a taco bell run driving down watt ave when we both noticed an unusual red light in the sky. both of us being believers, yet never witnessed, immediately pulled over and got out of the car. this red light was just hovering and began to shoot what looked like red laser beams down to earth. these beams would go out about a second after being emmitted one after the other.  after about 30 seconds of beam shooting the ufo started to float around the sky getting closer to us like it knew it was being watched. after 10 seconds of floating left to right, the red ufo simply dissapeared like turning off a house light. amazing!
content.summary: Redish orange ufo shooting red beams

content.detailedDescription: No more details.
content.summary: Statioary object. very bright. rapid ascent.

content.detailedDescription: On jnuary 2nd 2011 at approximately 18:20 (6:20 pm) hours while arriving from a holiday weekend at my home at homestead, fl; as i opened the rear slydind door to let my two large security dogs out, i observed as a glowing metalic sphere shooted out into the sky from my back yard. it went upwards as soon as i opened the sliding rear door and the dogs went out barking.With no sound bolted upwards until reaching cloud cover and made a 90degree angle heading west in a very high rated speed until i could not see it no more into the sky. on the ground i noticed two circular marks on the grass itself. marks are sort of circular burned patches on the ground with a white powdery ash. i am a state of florida law enforcement officer and a retired army infantryman. i have seen it all in the civilian life as well as in combat; and there is nothing like i have seen before. i have contacted a dear personal friend who is a retired air force commander and he said to contact mufon before anyone else. this is my second sighting in two years and the closest one of all. from skeptic to beleiver in two years.
content.summary: Metalic glowing sphere touching ground in my back yard.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something odd in the sky this morning (thurs. jan. 6, 2011) and just wanted to report it ��� it was possibly some type of weather or other balloon but not like anything i've seen before so ...Just for the record! i was driving on silas creek parkway in winston-salem around 9:15 am and as i slowed at the intersection of silas and peter's creek and was turning to the right onto peter's creek, i looked up to see something "floating" fairly high in sky to my left, in a south easterly direction.  what caught my eye was that it was very dark against the light blue morning sky, and elongated, vertical, strangely shaped - nothing like a "regular" flyaway helium balloon, banner, or any recognizable aircraft or bird -i almost hate to say but it reminded me of those "flying humanoid" things i've seen on tv!  i lost sight of it as i drove up to my bank on peter's creek parkway, but as i was sitting at the teller window i caught sight of it again, high over the tree line to my right, and i asked the teller if she could see it also, and asked her opinion of what it might be?  she said she could, and called another teller to come over and she also saw it, but all of us were frankly puzzled as to the object's identification or purpose.  just about that time, a flock of birds crossed overhead in the opposite direction, and i half-heartedly joked "well, at least i hope birds don't start dropping out of the sky like the news has been reporting all over the globe!" 

i was wondering if the national weather service had a balloon up there at the time or if anyone else had reported seeing the object, or if it was large enough to be caught on radar?  i would have thought it might be a collapsed balloon, except it seemed to keep moving at the same altitude or even higher, it certainly wasn't coming downward ��� but moving very slowly, almost seemed to be standing still at times - much slower than runaway balloons normally seem to travel in the atmosphere, it seemed to deliberately continue in the same direction the entire time - not moving erratically but very steadily.  honestly the best description i could give is, it looked rather like a hefty man suspended in the air - as if dangling from some invisible plane! except it had to be bigger than a person, because it was so visible at that height.  so all told, whatever it was, was in sight for at least 20 minutes and i could have probably sighted it longer, except i had to get to work at that point and could not continue to track it.
content.summary: Dark, elongated/vertical, unidentifiable floating object in clear morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am visiting my sister here in tucson and last evening comming home out on tanque verdie road west, "hopefully spelled right", we noticed what honestly looked like an airplane to me. it was comming straight at us at about 3000 ft, "i am a pilot".

suddenly, a relitivly bright "star like object" appeared to drop from it slowly. it was under control by someone or something as it stopped a few seconds, then headed west several seconds.

it then quickly headed back east toward us in the truck, maintaining altitude. it was changing colors from red to white but in a twinkling "star like fashion" there was no place to pull over in the first few seconds, but we kept the object in sight. then a second "starlike" object came out only this one was smaller. i got out and the "plane or what ever" passed over head. it was dark but i could see what looked like a long cylinder with very slim "wings" at the very back, there was no audible sound.

it had two white lights on the front, and two red lights at the rear close together in the center. there are lots of aircraft with a rear set wing, but these wings were comming from the very back where the horizontal stabilizers are normally located, and appeared to be more like sticks than wings as they were very narrow.

it did not have the normal marking lights of an airplane. no red light on the port wingtip, no green light on the starboard side, and no white light at the rear, just the two red lights close together. having never seen anything like this before i was caught up in the moment and lost sight of the smaller object as it was like a far away star you almost had to look away from slightly to see.

i had binoculars in the truck but by the time i got them out i could not find the first starlike object any longer and the people in the back seat were making jokes about my sister and i as we were the only ones who could see it from the from the front seat of the four door pick up.

we were just a minute or two from home, and i again tried to re locate any part of what we saw, but could not. i just cant understand what or why an aircraft would release something like that.
content.summary: Some sort of aircraft dropped two star like objects

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being filed by the maryland mufon state director on behalf of a witness and a reporter that wish to remain anonymous.  this a report of a "first-hand" report

on december 30, 2010, an individual traveling north on rt 109 north of poolsville, md., passed the curve north of the jerusalem road intersection and encountered  a stopped vehicle in the road ahead of him.  he looked left (west) and saw the object [a dark "square" (diamond?), approximately 50 yards on a side, fixed white lights on all four corners, about 75 yards west of the road over a farm field, about 1000 feet lower than normal approach altitude into dulles international airport, moving such that a corner was the forward point) moving  slowly (direction not given).  he initially thought it was a helicopter.  he turned off the car radio, opened the window to listen, and heard nothing.  two vehicles traveling southbound also saw the object and stopped. the weather that evening was mostly clear with some high clouds.
content.summary: Large, "square" ufo sighted north of poolsville md at 7pm on 12/30/10

content.detailedDescription:
I took the dog out at about 9:30 pm and noticed what seemed to be a dancing star.  there was no pattern, just dancing around the same area.  there was no moon and though there is an airport nearby, it wasn't a plane. i got my camera, a kodak p712 that takes videos and tried to video it.  

i was puzzled, i could not figure out what it was.  i looked for trailing lights to see if it was a spotlight, but did not see anything, just that ball dancing.  i did not even know it had colors until i downloaded it from the camera.  it looked like white light to me watching it. 

i shrugged, put my camera away, called the dog and went to bed.  later the next morning i remembered it and download the film from the camera and saw the colored lights. 

i uploaded it, at slower speed, to youtube - *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).
content.summary: It looked like a dancing star, darting around in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned off of state road 130 in hobart, and was heading south on county line road on sunday, january 2, 2011 at 7:05am when i noticed an intense light in the distance coming from the sky to the east, seemingly several miles in the distance.  i first assumed it to be a conventional craft; however, what was strange about it was how brightly the light was glowing, especially considering that it was essentially day-time. i continued to monitor the craft out of curiosity and soon thereafter the intense light began to subside, but not completely diminish, revealing more details about the craft's design.  it had no easily discernible surface features and appeared to be completely smooth, the brightness of the light on the structure had greatly decreased and remained only as a dull orb of illumination that was located in the middle of the underside of the craft which itself was clearly disc-shaped, though at one point it did appear to have perhaps some more angular and geometric features, though the general shape of the craft itself appeared to be that of a disc, there were obviously no wings, and all other features that could be seen as being indicative of a conventional human origin were absent. the object hovered in the sky without any sort of obvious flight path, it did move left and right, up and down, but these were slight and graceful maneuvers that were not easily noticeable, or dramatic. after the first minute, or two of observation it had noticeably moved closer to my position which i found to be disconcerting as i was the only one in the car, and on the road at the time.  as i got a closer-view of it i noted it seemed to have a gunmetal coloring best described as a dull gray/black.  i continued to keep my eyes fixed on it and it appeared to "blink" out of distance 3-4 times, i had considerably slowed my speed and was clearing tracking it when i noted it "vanishing" and "reappearing".  the way it moved was very strange and foreign, if i had not been able to see changes in where it was positioned in the air, it would've been very difficult to even perceive its movement.  at this point i had been watching it for nearly 5 minutes when trees and other objects in the road started becoming obstacles and preventing me from seeing it..  the craft started out coming from the east, heading west, and with a considerable altitude (it is difficult for me to exactly estimate its starting height in the sky as i have no background in such things and it would be an arbitrary guess.), and by the end of the sighting had noticeably lowered its altitude, maybe comparable to the altitude you'd commonly see a low-flying helicopter and appeared to be moving west and at my last glimpse of it, it had crossed over to the other side of county line road and seemed to be clearly moving west, where as initially it was difficult to ascertain a flight path.  it is also worth noting that i had am radio on the whole time for background noise, and when the ufo was at its closest point to me the radio completely ceased to function briefly, first there was a gratuitous amount of static, then the radio went silent, though it was still on.  this could be completely unrelated, or have a completely mundane explanation, but it is too big of a coincidence not to mention.  and as mentioned before, when i first spotted the object it appeared to be several miles in the distance, and towards the end of the sighting its distance away could be measured in hundreds of meters.  i eventually turned off the road, i continued to scan the sky for the object, but there was no trace that i could see.  i did not immediately share this occurrence with anyone, besides one person, because of the unavoidable skepticism and scrutiny it would inevitably bring as well as the sort of persisting environment of ridicule that exists for those making any sort of claim that is perceived to be extraordinary.
content.summary: I witnessed a disc-shaped craft that clearly exceeds any publically acknowledged technological capabilities.

content.detailedDescription: Winnetka ca 91306 4:55am - 5:24am and still going. its not a plane. it doesn't appear to be a plane because i've seen other planes in the sky far and near at the same time as this. just thought someone should know if they wanted investigate this and similar reports if any. i took a many pictures with my phone but they probably suck because its dark.
content.summary: Very bright and some what distant light definitely not a star. it moved kinda weird @ 1 point. its still here

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on our patio of our condo, which faces a green belt, drinking my morning tea, i thought i heard a muffled sound above and behind me and looked up to see a dark triangle low in the sky right over the trees of the green belt in front of me moving slowly in a sw direction  

it didn't make sense to me because as soon as i noticed it, it wasn't making any noise.  it appeared to be gliding silently with one red light blinking at the front of the triangle and two steady white lights at the tips of the other two ends of the triangle.  i really didn't know what to make of it.  it was just a dark triangle against the somewhat dark sky.

i watched it for a few seconds and then lost sight of it as it disappeared behind the trees in the distance.  it was really only after i lost sight of it that it seemed to sink in that i had just seen something unusual.  at that realization, i got up out of my chair, walked inside and immediately wrote down the time, the direction it was moving and drew a sketch of what i'd seen.  i didn't have any particular feelings except that i remember thinking to myself, did this really just happen?

i thought about waking my boyfriend but didn't.  i just went about my morning routine getting ready for work.  i pretty much forgot all about it till i came home from work and saw my drawing on the kitchen counter.  then i told my boyfriend and googled your site to make this report.
content.summary: Silent triangle 2 white lights one red moving sw over trees

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving  to work out in the uinta and ouray oil feild i notested a bright light in the sky as i watched it it had faded out to nothing this took 40sc then illuminated back to being real bright this all so took 40sc the color of this light was a yellow ish this shape was triagular as if u took 3 balls and put them together i could not see the center du to the bright light  but i could see the outer edge the hight of this object was in the atmustfr it was south east south east all so it was clear skys i all so called my co worker on the cb he all so was driving i told him to look up to see if he could see it he said yes . so we got tired of looking at it so we whent to work :)
content.summary: I saw a brite light

content.detailedDescription:
New year's eve 2010, at approximately 11:00 pm pst, my wife and i both observed two orangish objects in the southeast night sky, approximately 25-30 degrees above the horizon.  based on the surrounding hills, it was our guess that they might have been somewhere between the towns of peshastin, wa and cashmere, wa although if they were higher up or big, they might have been closer to wenatchee, wa.  the sighting was through a large bathroom window.  

being an extremely clear night, it was easy to distinguish the two objects from the surrounding stars, not only because of their color, but also because they were considerably larger than the stars. in fact, that is what attracted us to them, not only because of the orange glow, but also because they were bigger than the surrounding stars and in a place where we had never seen big stars. 

because it was night, we didn't have any way of telling how high up they were and what size they were.  all we could tell is that they appeared as if they were orbs. at that point, our instincts told us that the objects were perhaps 10 miles to our southeast and maybe several thousand feet above the ground, but those facts are purely guesses. 

at first, each object appeared to be stationary.  perhaps a minute later, one of the objects appeared to travel slowly to the northwest, which would have put it on a straight course to possibly travel over our house.  as it progressed, it also appeared to become  slightly larger than it was initially, which would probably be the case if it was, in fact, headed our way. 

when they both started moving our way, all of a sudden the second orb, which was behind the first one when we first saw them, seemed to do an about face and went in a south east direction for a few seconds, then appeared as if it was heading toward the ground.  we lost sight of it when it went down below the hills which surround our home.  

the object moving in our direction appeared to be about 60- 75 degrees above the southeast horizon.  after traveling toward our home for about a minute or so, it appeared to stop and seemed as if it was perhaps only a mile or two away and several thousand feet above the ground. again, the distances are strictly speculation.  

since the remaining object was now much higher in the sky and closer to our home, i went outside for a better view.  the object was still glowing orange and remained stationary.  suddenly, the object began to pulsate with a strong, white light which lasted several seconds.  it reminded me of a strobe light.  the light was so bright, it was difficult to look directly at it.  after maybe 5 seconds, the white light then faded back to the orange glow and then repeated itself perhaps two more times, each time emitting the same strobe-like white light.  

after the strobe light episode, the orange glow of the orb pulsated, making the object appear larger, then it would go back to the original size.  the length of time it took for it to grow larger then return to the original size was about four seconds.  it then paused for around 5-10 seconds and then repeated the growing large then returning to the original size again.  it did this around 4 or 5 times.  after that episode, it then slowly, over the course of maybe 15 seconds, faded until there was nothing left to observe.

the entire sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes.  throughout the sighting, we were astounded that there was absolutely no sound.  again, because we were unable to use a frame of reference, it could have been so high up that we wouldn't hear any sound.

because the sighting was so noticable to us, we thought others must have seen what we saw but in subsequent days we heard nothing and saw nothing in the local media, until we were directed to the ufo northwest website, where we read the account of the family in bremerton, wa.  

their appearance, and the fact that there was more than one, lead us to speculate that maybe we were seeing similar objects. we also thought there might be some connection to the many folks who were setting off fireworks throughout the valley but neither one of us had ever seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed on new years eve:  two moving, orange orbs, one of which stopped and pulsated a brilliant white light

content.detailedDescription: Was in my kitchen when my daughter called and said she saw "the lights", she was very excited and thought this was them for sure ( we have seen these in our area several times now) she was on her way to her boyfriends house when she saw a large glowing light in the sky, it lit up moved down very slowly and went out. so i went out on the porch and looked in the direction they always seem to be. we both saw the twinkling star type lights that  we have noticed have come before, at the time we see the big lights. we were talking about how they aren't stars and its strange how they change color, from red, green and white. these are usually in a large group with a half dozen or more, seeming to jump around or change direction quickly( not planes) as we were talking about them all the sudden the big set of lights started lighting up. huge and bright lights that were dark yellow or amber colored, starting on the right then going left one by one another would light and the others behind went off. my kids had ran out on porch behind me and my son counted eight total. i was too busy trying to calm down my screaming daughter on the phone as she was in a secluded area and was scared. then i got my video camera and watched but they didn't light up again this night. twinkling lights were there maybe an hour more then they were all gone. will look again tonight as it seems before we see them a few days in a row. it was a very clear night outside.
content.summary: 8 amber lights that lit up, like slow chasing lights. appeared to be a very large half circle shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Description: at approximately 7:30 pm on march 1, 2008 i noted a large object, looking like the little dipper hanging straight down with glowing lights pulsing around it. the lights had a haze around them. the object did not move and two aircraft flew under it and were dwarfed by it's size. (one aircraft was flying east and the other aircraft was flying west.) four us watched it and took a video of it. the direction of the object was to the "south and west."

comments: this is an unusual sighting given characteristics described. i am not sure what the witnesses sighted. i am trying to obtain a copy of the video. any updates will be posted.


went outside at about 9:30 pm with friend to smoke a cigarette. we see very similar object to that described above but more tight and triangular lights [~ 6 or 7] than little dipper described above but "dipper" did come to mind but much brighter than any stars and tighter cluster than dipper. large, sometimes lights steady, sometimes lights flickering. white lights mostly, occasionally, a few lights greenish blue when flickering. south of our location about 20 degrees, it moved very slowly from from east to west [over about an hour and a half] to about 30 degrees above the western horizon. we were coming in and out of the house while watching the ufc. we figured it would disappear over the west but around forty five minutes later, around twelve o'clock, we again went out and it was about 30 degrees east of the original sighting. we didn't have any binoculars or telescope available. my friend who has lived there for more than a year, said he never saw anything like it. surveillance came to mind. altitude, unsure but rather high because it looked like an exceedingly bright cluster of stars with a dull white round halo. no sound. we are in a very rural area with many oil and gas wells and large gas storage facilities. any feedback welcome.

seen every night from 01/01/2011 until today at 5 in the morning from 8:30 pm previous day]. mostly steady with increasing and diminishing intensity, sometimes flashing, variegated colors. during the day, "airforce contrails" along the path of the object[s?] from the previous night sky. ten times brighter than the brightest stars and in clusters.
content.summary: Large cluster of  pyramidal lights slowly crossing east to west then again seen east

content.detailedDescription: My wife and friends were watching the christmas tree light show at wiregrass mall in tampa/wesley chapel. i was doing a video clip on my digital camera. 50 seconds into the music we all saw a flalling star or some other object fall directly in our line of site.  we were facing due east and that sort of lines up with the space coast some distance away. i am not sure if it was a comet or meteor. it seemed more like it was coming down near verticle and i thought it might be falling space junk. there was some color observed by my wife and fiends. was pretty exciting and we new immediately that it was from space.The object seemed to falling since it was nearly vertical and only had a slight arch . it appeared to be coming from the north while we looked east. it also had red trailing off the back  we watched it till it was near the horizon.
content.summary: Descending verticly like meteorbut much slower like falling space debris

content.detailedDescription: We were on the roof of my apartment with my family is my wife and my three children and an old friend was the night of december 31, 2010 time exact era as at 23: 20 and suddenly i see something in the sky and tell my family that artificial game not exploited but when i see that it goes very fast i say that is a ufos look quickly go and tell my wife takes a quick picture and took it but as it was the ufos far took the photo and was released as a point because the camera we have is not professional the ufos was heading from northeast to southwest me is watching it around for 4 minutes and then interfered clouds and then a building that i had in front of us and then not so i went to see this is what they saw as my family and my friend. sorry this is a translation of the spanish language english
content.summary: I was on the roof of my apartment waiting for the end of the year and saw a fireball about 4 minutes the witness

content.detailedDescription: Around 9 pm last nigh i was watching tv and a flashing light caught my attention.I went to the window and looked at it for a few seconds.I then took my binochulars and went outside and watchedthis craft for about 9 or ten min.Buy naked eye it looks as if the lights just strobebut through the binochulars it was rotateing counter clockwise.The craft was oval shaped with what looked like port hole windows that were lite up solid amber.There were red green and blue strobeing lights on it also.I watched it move west to east slowly it came to a hover over446 for abouttwo min.Id say it was about 9 hundred feet up.After hovering it stared to slowly move north toward then slowly chane back to the east where it then started an what looked loike a desent approch.It then whent behind trees and i lost sight.As it hung over 446 there was complete silence outside as it started to move againthe woods behind my house came alive it sounded like a whole herd of deer were running around.This was no plane or helecopter it was silent and was a struktured craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Amber colored with blue green and red strobing lights

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of october 9, 2010, i stepped outside the house of a friend i was visiting in glan conwy, wales.  it was quite dark, there was a solid ceiling of clouds not high but not low either. i noticed a reddish-orange light in the sky heading in my general direction from the west. it was slow moving, much like the speed of a slow moving helicopter, my first thought is that it was and the bright light was its search beacon. i didn't think too much of it until it came closer, but i continued to watch it.

it was flying in a straight and level path well below the cloud cover and soon began a wide-arced turn which is when i started to realize it was something abnormal. the bright light never dimmed as a search beacon should have if it had been turned away. i dashed into the house, grabbed my camera and snapped off a shot.  unfortunately, the shutter remained open for 1/10 of a second causing a blurred shot.  it was too dark to see the adjustments on my camera so i didn't take any more shots. the object had grown closer as it made its turn to the north, appearing much like a very bright military flare at this point.  there was no smoke coming from it, the sky was clear enough that i would easily have seen any.  it made no sound, no red and white lights hazzard lights were flashing from either side and the intensity of the light made it impossible to see any details of the object. i doubt it could have been more than 10 to 20 feet in height and width.  its speed never varied, its trajectory seemed to be controlled as it never climbed, dipped or wavered to either side. there is no way anyone could convince me that this was a chinese lantern...Far too bright to be that. i estimate the closest it got to me was within 1/4 mile, its altitude being only 1000 to 1500 feet at most.

i continued to observe the object for a full four to five minutes before it dissappeared over the hilltops to the northwest, heading in the direction of the nearest raf base. the light grew only slightly dimmer as the object grew more distant. while the object was recorded on my camera the duration of the shutter opening showed movement of the camera and gave the recorded image the appearance of a fireball with a tail (a tail that the object i saw did not possess). i more adhered to the object being something military in nature due to both my lack of explanation of it and its course in the direction of the raf base.  that is until my friend called me from the uk on december 31, 2010 to tell me she had seen two objects near her house (that same house) which matched my description to a tee. that's when i started searching and saw there seems to be many sightings identical in nature from many parts of the world.
content.summary: Reddish-orange flare-like object over north wales

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house when my mom went to put some clothes in the washroom, which is outside. i followed her and intended to stay indoors since it was really cold that night. i was waiting when i noticed something bright between the branches of one of our trees. i thought is was a plane, so i moved a little and waited. it stayed still. i immediately wanted to see what it was so i went back to my room and grabbed a jacket and shoes. once i got outside, i took a better look. it looked like a street lamp, but in the sky and brighter. at this point, i thought it was a star. it was still in the same spot as before, my it looked like it was slowly landing. i was excited to have spotted something, so i didn't really care what its was. my mom had noticed me outside and asked what i was doing. i turned around to face her but when i went to point it out to her, it was already gone. i don't know if this is related, but when i had opened the door, a lot of the neighborhood dogs were barking like crazy. my mom said that they were barking the whole time she was out there. after the light disappeared, they were silent. but our dog did nothing out of the ordinary that whole time.
content.summary: Still light that slowly landed after a couple of seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Driving towards yuma on the 8, i noticed a oval or spherical object which looked white over the mountain range where i believe yuma proving ground is. i noticed it did not move. after going over the little pass and down into yuma, i looked and could still see it. it had not changed position for over 25-30 minutes. in yuma, we had lunch at the crackerbarrel and after leaving and continuing west on hwy 8, it was still in the same position, appearing to have not move. there were no other aircraft in site. we guessed it may be something tethered, but it seemed extremely high over the mountains and quite large considering it's size. i attempted to take a picture of it with my sony 14 megapixel point and shoot, but the pictures don't offer much as far as detail. i am convinced the object remained stationary, or moved so slowly it appeared to be stationary (this was possible because i was after all moving along the highway and only looking at it periodically).  i am certain this was not a cloud, star, planet, bird, helicopter, or traditional aircraft. it could have been a tethered balloon (if so it was a strange white color, appeared to be almost glowing or softly reflecting sunlight). the sky was clear for the most part and the sun was bright. i lost site of the object after leaving yuma, driving west, and it eventually was out of sight from the highway, behind us.
content.summary: Stationary object seen in daytime while driving into yuma, az from the east on hwy 8

content.detailedDescription: I was in my laundry room putting clothes in the drier. than i was looking  out the window over my washer and saw this orange light just sitting there in the distance. so i was like what the hell is that. so i walked out my back door and it was just hovering there and than it moved behind the trees and than came back again.After that i just watch the ufo go from being in the trees to lifting straight up and moved to the right and that's when i saw all the lights they were multi colored and than i saw a star like one that started moving too. than it shot all the way over my house and went right over my neighborhouse
content.summary: It was a cylinder with multi colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out of my house and looked into the very cloudy sky and saw what appeared to be a search light in the sky going around in erratic circles. but, the circular shaped light seemed to be on the inside of the clouds.  i couldn't see any actual light or beam, what i saw was a shadow of a light that looked as though it was coming through the clouds. curious, i got in my vehicle and wanted to get underneath this to see if i could see a beam or anything that would dismiss this as simply a search light. as i drove the pattern of this shadow continued to be erratic in its flight. it was also very fast and seemed to "skip" or "slide" across the sky at a very fast rate.  well, i suddenly found myself directly under this phenomenon. i had the feeling this thing knew i was watching it.  i started to see a break in the clouds and focused on this point to see if i could see anything other than the shadowy glow and the thing disappeared as though someone turned the light off.  i witnessed this phenomenon for about 30 minutes or so. perhaps this was a search light.  but, then why was there a search light in rocklin on a monday night?  i have lived here for years and have never seen a search light.  and, why wasn't there any beam that could be seen?  and, why did the light seem dim and appear to be coming from within the cloud formation?
content.summary: A dim, shadowy, roundish, white green light like a search light

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke and as i stepped out my back door i saw over the roof of the house behind mine what i thought at 1st was a plane i 
walked to the left lit my cigarette and looked up at jupiter (i think) which i always do at night, but i could still see the "plane" in my 
peripheral vision and it didn't seem to have moved so i walked back over to the left and i could see it unobstructed between two tree branches so 
i used the branches to try and judge movement and i couldn't see any and i now noticed it looked a bit odd there were two normal white lights 
that looked the same as on most commercial jets but they were in the middle very close together and there were two outer lights but all four were very close together and at the outer lights it seemed to curve some and there was no bright white blinking off of any of them which you normally see on planes and there was no small red blue or green blinking light that i could see anywhere, i was starting to panic at this point because it still wasn't moving and now i can't remember what color the two outer lights were. at that point i ran left again to knock on my kitchen windows then i thought no one inside would come fast enough, so i ran inside and my mom was right there and she came out right away and saw it, it still hadn't moved then i ran back in and told my brother to grab his binoculars (i don't know why i didn't think camera) and i threw my sons coat at him because i wanted him to see too, when i ran back outside it still hadn't moved and i was trying to point it out to my son, then it started dipping below the tree line i think at this point it had been a good 5-8 minutes (hard to tell when you're that excited but my cigarette had burned down) so i ran down my back stairs and up my driveway and i could still see it between trees and then a few seconds later i couldn't see it anymore. my brother and son never saw it, my mother did and she said it looked wierd not like a plane at all but she thinks it may have been a helicopter, but she says it definitely was not moving at all for a few minutes.I believe in ufo's, i always have as far back as i can remember and i have seen one in broad daylight back in about 1997, but i'm not crazy and i don't think every flashing light in the sky is a ufo, i'm a very rational, objective person. i live in boston and i'm very accustomed to airplanes and helicopters day and night, i'm well aware how they can look odd sometimes especially at night and how they can look like they aren't moving. this was positvely not moving, and i'm about 98% sure it was a saucer shaped ufo. i do want to add though, air traffic seemed quite normal so i'm guessing there was nothing odd picked up on radar anywhere.
content.summary: Could have been mistaken for a plane if it weren't stationery

content.detailedDescription:
My friend josh and i were standing outside looking for meteors during a meteor shower and he noticed something streaking across the sky. he pointed it out to me and we both watched dumbfounded as this thing streaked across the sky parallel to us. it was dark grey, had sort of a pinecone shape. it had no lights and there was an erie silence as it streaked past. it also had no tail engine or light in the rear as it passed us. we initially thought it was a satellite streaking by but it was much closer and didn't glow like they do. it was almost barely visible. there was no glow like something reentering earths atmosphere either. we estimated it to be at about 15,000-20,000ft traveling quite quickly like satellites do. it then made a sharp adjustment in its trajectory and we watched it until it disappeared behind trees and houses. i made a quick sketch of the incident within a minute.

the moment (when looking for meteors) sounded like this: 
"oh theres one! ..Wait, what is that? 
-i dont know. ..Its not glowing or anything. 
-maybe its a satellite. 
-no....Thats too low. 
(10 seconds of stunned silence)

-whoa what was that?! 
-i dont know, there werent any lights on it either.."

we tried to rationalize all different scenarios of what it could be. nothing fit. so we looked up mufon and found the fl group.

*(names of two witnesses deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Fast moving dark object disturbs meteor shower viewing

content.detailedDescription:
I was on foot on the naito parkway just north of the intersection of sw naito & arthur.  as the naito parkway makes its way over the 405, there is a great view of mt. hood and since this day was bright and clear, mt. hood was particularly visible.

i had headphones on and the world was drowned out by the beats of amon tobin.  i continued ahead, but turned my head to the right so i could check out the view.  i was noting to myself that mt. hood was remarkably white with snow and that hopefully we'll have plenty of water this summer, when i noticed some movement out of my left field of vision.  there was a tiny dot in the sky - about the size of half a grain of white rice - moving in a straight southern direction.  what struck me immediately was that it appeared to be gliding, rather then flying.  

there are often planes flying over this space in a north/south direction and for an instant, i thought i was seeing a passenger plane.  no sooner had i thought this, then i realized the for a plane to be that far away, it was moving awfully fast, so i immediately rationalized it as a sea gull; also not an uncommon sight along this road.

note: i travel on foot on this road several times a week and i've done so for years; i am very familiar with the general environment.

but, i couldn't see any wings.

as i was processing this - perhaps two seconds had passed - it passed directly behind an electrical pole.  i began leaning foreword in an attempt to see around it and as a result was able to see just the northern-facing end of it as it, without slowing or stopping, began to move in a more easterly direction, exactly along my line of sight of the pole.

it moved along the pole for perhaps another second and then, once again without slowing or stopping, continued on its southerly course at a very brisk glide.

it never slowed or sped up.  it just kept going until it was gone.

part ii: the next day

note: since i've told a few people this story, i have been amazed how many people don't know what i mean by "book light".  google "book light" if you are one of these people.

i have, or rather, had, a small purple book light i bought at walmart a couple years ago.  i happened to be using it during my day on saturday and when i packed up to leave downtown, i forgot to put my light in my bag and instead put in my right coat pocket.  my coat is a rather heavy down jacket and the pockets are thick and deep.

i know i put it in my pocket, because as i was walking, i remember rolling it in my hand a number of times.

when i got home, i threw my coat on the couch and went to the bathroom.  while in the bathroom, i remembered my book light and wanted to make sure i got it out of my pocket before i forgot.  i went back into the front room, picked up my coat, reached into the pocket and it was gone.

my first thought was that it had fallen out as i took my hand out of my pocket at some point on the way home.  a couple weeks earlier this happened with my bus pass, so it was a very real possibility.  but, i also thought, perhaps i had absent-mindedly put it in another pocket or my bag.

nope.  not anywhere.

i thought, perhaps it fell into the sofa cushions when i threw my coat there.  pulled them all out.  nope.

i looked all around the general area in case it had fallen out when i threw my coat.  nope.

it was gone, having fallen out of my pocket.  damn it!  i gotta be more careful about that.

i go into the bathroom and take a long shower and go directly into my bedroom and dink around on the computer.

about two or three hours have passed since i looked for my light and its now about 10:45pm.

i go out into the front room and bam!  its right there, smack-dab in the middle of my front room!

bright purple light on the light cream carpet.  how could have i missed that?

the answer: there's no way i could have missed it!

i got goose bumps and was a little freaked out.

i called a couple of friends to tell them what had happened, but no one answered.  so, i called my mom.

i didn't touch it.  i left it on the floor.

i'll deal with it in the morning.

i got up just after eight.

it was gone.

i live alone.  i have no pets.  the doors were locked.
content.summary: Small object moving due south, made 90 degree turn, then another, then continued south.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house playing video games. we decided to go for a walk. beside his house is a steep hill/mountain thing into the woods. it lead to a large field like clearing.We climbed all the way up and walked a ways into the field. his girlfriend called his phone and he answered. while waiting on him i took out my camera and began taking pictures of the field and woods and stuff. i just took some random shots not really paying no attention or anything. i then later on posted the pictures on facebook. a friend of mine then drew my attention to something in the top right hand corner up in the sky. it looked like something we couldnt explain. i was completely startled by this. because at the time there was no noice in the field other than my friend on the phone and i hadnt noticed it before i was shocked by this being int the photo. my friend thought it might be some sort of bug just flew up but i think its something more like a ufo.
content.summary: A picture i took at a friends house

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in the living room of my apartment in cole valley.  there are big bay windows, and we live on the third floor.  the windows face south towards sutro tower.  i was watching tv on the my laptop with a dim lamp on in the room.  a flashing light caught my eye from the top of the hills to the south.  i looked out the window and saw a series of flashes from the top of the hill, perhaps a quarter mile away.  my first thought was that someone was taking flash photographs from the top of the hill.  why someone would do this in the middle of the night is beyond me, but i was searching for a rational explanation for what i was seeing.  the flashing went on for perhaps five minutes, in intervals of about thirty seconds, flashing five to seven times each time.  as i continued to look towards the top of the hill, the flashing became less regular in its intensity, whereas the first several flashes had been a bright white,  the next several flashes were infused with bits of vibrant red and blue.  next, the flashing light took a different position on top of the same hill, slightly off to the side of where it had been.  it glowed a faint "trio" of white, blue, and red light.  the light then seemed to sort of morph and change, and a glowing orb "flew" to the hill that is the eastern side of where the ucsf medical center and campus are.  as the orb flew past, the houses on the hill behind it were illuminated a brilliant red hue, directly behind where it passed.  i use the word "flew" in quotes because the orb object seemed to move in a way that was more "fluid gliding" if that makes sense.  it seemed to be made of plasma, and the light that it was/carried was like a "liquid light".  the orb then seemed to reposition itself on the new hill and stayed hovered there. it stayed a redish-amber glow at this point.  as i continued to look, i noticed two other lights positioned above and behind the orb.  they seemed to hover in the trees, and seemed very small, perhaps the size of bicycle headlamps.  i stood and watched for half an hour, this trio of hovering of small lights, one amber-red orb, the other two small twittering, twinkling white lights.  the lights were perhaps an eighth of a mile away. the smaller lights seemed to "twitter", or blink and flash in a way that looked like a morse code.  this configuration stayed put until the time i went to bed.  i felt somewhat afraid that the objects would get closer.  i, of course woke and they were gone.
content.summary: Colorful orb illuminates san francisco houses
